alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Lee; Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lee, southeastern Chambers and northwestern Russell Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cusseta to near Beulah to near Griffen Mill. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Auburn, Opelika, Valley, Lanett, La Fayette, Lakeview, Cusseta, Chambers County Lake, Beulah, Beans Mill, Huguley, Fairfax, River View, Beauregard, Oak Bowery, Bleecker, Griffen Mill, Robert G. Pitts Airport, Lanett Municipal Airport and I 85 Welcome Center At Lanett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
